data.title: The PA Academy — Blog — Atlanta Film Society
data.text:
Dive Into Our 2018 Summer Education Series!

This summer is jam packed with educational courses that'll set you up on the right track. Start with some info on the pre-production phase with our Back to One Filmmaking Basics course.

Read More

The PA Academy is back on July 22-23. Register Now!

This two day, bootcamp-style Production Assistant workshop is perfect for those just starting their career in the industry as well as those looking to advance their knowledge of what it takes to succeed as an office or on-set production assistant working on commercials, industrials, music videos, independent films, television series and studio features.

Read More

Have you registered for the PA Academy on April 22-23? If not, GO!

This two day, bootcamp-style Production Assistant workshop is perfect for those just starting their career in the industry as well as those looking to advance their knowledge of what it takes to succeed as an office or on-set production assistant working on commercials, industrials, music videos, independent films, television series and studio features.

Read More

The PA Academy on November 12-13 is Filling Up Fast! Register NOW!

In association with GPP and PC&E, we are pleased to present the Fall 2016 edition of The PA Academy with Linda Burns! Get expert training in this two-day bootcamp.

Read More
